item.description:
Back by popular demand, la terza serata insieme. Rosaria is back!! Mille grazie! This time Rosaria Tenace will speak about obtaining dual citizenship, who is eligible, what it means to have it and if you are interested, how to obtain it.

This meetup is limited to 20 people.

6:05pm Rosaria Tenace presents Italian Dual Citizenship

7:00pm dinner

The cost is $15 per person which includes the following:

ANTIPASTO - Mixed Italian Affettati, Salame, Sopressata, Capocollo; - Formaggi, Olive, Verdure sott'olio (Pickled Italian vegetables), like peppers, eggplants, etc. - Crusty Italian bread.

PASTA: - Long Pasta: Spaghetti al Pomodoro and Basilico (in celebration of the Neapolitan cuisine) and Orecchiette with Broccoli Rape and Italian Sausage (in celebration of the Apulian cuisine) A glass of wine will also be served and it is included in the price of $15 per person.This also includes your tip.

Please RSVP if you are planning to come! An actual head count will be needed a couple of days before the event. Please have cash for Rosaria ready the night of our meetup. You will be responsible for $15 if you are a no show that evening.

This is must for those of you that have never attended one of our meetups! You wanted Italian culture, well here it is!!!!

Grazie e buona giornata! Lorenzo
item.name: 3rd Serata Insieme(evening together) Wed. Oct.10
